member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.GetBitwiseInstructionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of bitwise instructions.
member.param: A pointer to the number of bitwise instructions.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.GetConversionInstructionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of conversion instructions used in a shader.
member.param: A pointer to a UINT that will contain the conversion instruction count when the method returns.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.GetGSInputPrimitive
member.param: A pointer to the input-primitive type (see ).
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.GetMovcInstructionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of Movc instructions.
member.param: A pointer to the number of Movc instructions.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.GetMovInstructionCount
member.summary: Gets the number of Mov instructions.
member.param: A pointer to the number of Mov instructions.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.GetResourceBindingDescByName
member.summary: Gets a resource binding description by name.
member.param: A pointer to a string containing the variable name.
Pointer to a structure that will be populated with resource binding information.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.GetVariableByName
member.param: A pointer to a string containing the variable name.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.IsLevel9Shader
member.summary: Indicates whether a shader was compiled in Direct3D 10 on Direct3D 9 mode.
member.param: Pointer to a BOOL variable that will be set true if the shader was compiled in Direct3D 10 on Direct3D 9 mode; otherwise false.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1.IsSampleFrequencyShader
member.summary: Indicates whether a pixel shader is intended to run a pixel frequency or sample frequency.
member.param: A pointer to a BOOL variable that will be set to true if the shader is intended to run at sample frequency; false otherwise.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10ShaderReflection1
member.summary: A shader-reflection interface accesses shader information.
